text.value: Match number and letters in order
Draw a clock pointing to ten past eleven
Read list of words subject must repeat them. Do 2 trials, even if 1st trial is successful. Do a recall aftr 5 minutes.
Face, Velvet, Church, Daisy and Red
Face, Velvet, Church, Daisy and Red
Subject has to repeat them in forward order
Subject has to repeat them in backward order

linkId.value: Attention_Q3 (F B A C M N A A J K L B A F A K D E A A A J A M O F A A B)

text.value: Read list of letters. The subject must tap with his hand at each letter A. No point if >2 errors.
I only know that John is the one to help today.
The cat always hid under the couch when dogs were in the room.
Fluency / Name maximum number of words in one minute that begin with the letter F
Similarity between e.g. banana - orange = fruit
Has to recall words WITH NO CUE
